runs.comm: banged in short outside off, a touch too wide and Nazir lets it go
short of a good length outside off and moving in a hint, tries to force it from the crease through the off side, bowled at 139 kmph, mistimes it back towards the bowler
slower one this time, cutting in towards Nazir who defends it on the leg side
smack! Just a fraction short outside off, moves back and slaps the poor thing through cover and point for a boundary
smartly done, shortish again, gets it a little high on the bat but manages to clear mid-on as he pulls it over the fielder
the offcutter, short of a good length , turned to short midwicket
nice start, lands on a good length on the off and moves away, defends it towards cover
shortish on middle, punched from the crease towards mid-on
full and wide, gets it to move away at the right time as Akmal tries to smash it hard over mid-off, misses
short of a good length on middle, tries to turn it away through midwicket, gets a leading edge as it moves away and it falls in front of extra cover
moves away again, short of a good length outside off, tries to push it away from the body through cover, misses
hurling it on a good length on middle, turned away to fine leg for a single
short of a good length on the off, drops it into the leg side short of midwicket and races off
good length on the off, slaps it straight off the front foot towards mid-off
banged in short on the off, pulls it away hard through square leg, got into position early and earned a boundary
short of a good length on the off, runs it down to third man for a single
pitched it up outside off, in the slot outside off, gets forward and drives it handsomely over the covers for a boundary
change of pace, slower one this time which is guided down to third man
down the leg side, tries to glance it fine, misses, called a wide
stifled appeal for lbw, thought he was struck on the pads before he punched it to mid-off, the umpire shakes his head
fullish on the off, driven through to mid-off on the front foot
poor delivery, short on middle and leg, swivels and helps it down the fine-leg boundary, a strong start this
mistimes that one, walked across to clip that good-length delivery over square leg, ended up playing it to midwicket instead
banged in short and gets the treatment, goes for the pull and the extra bounce works to his advantage as he gets the top edge over the keeper to the ropes
Southee's getting hammered, gifts him with a length ball on middle and Kamran clears midwicket beautifully with one clean swing, drops a couple of yards in front of the ropes and rolls over
starts with a wide, banged in short and was too high as he tried to pull it square, tried hard to reach it but there was no way he could
you knew it was six when he struck it, came off the middle and produced a sweet sound as he clattered it over square leg into the stands, a familiar beginning for Butler
full, in the blockhole this time, dug out towards cover

bowled'im! Excellent length, targeting the blockhole and it works, on middle and leg, slightly slower, bowled at 127 kmph, Nazir, in his attempt to dig it out, was too early into his shot, missed it and heard the death rattle
confidently played as he drives it to mid-off off the front foott
fullish on the off, gets forward, closes the face and pushes it wide of midwicket for a single
bowled full on middle, drives it back down the pitch and hits Umar's bat, prevented a single there
lands full outside off and moves away after sucking him into the drive, beaten
short of a good length on the off, tapped towards cover off the front foot
shortish on the off, guides it off the back foot towards point where a fumble allows them a single
slower one bowled short on the off, taps it towards midwicket from the crease
came off the middle, a good clean strike, pitched it up on middle, he got forward and launched him over the long-on boundary
driven well but straight to McCullum at mid-off
lands on a good length on the off, guides it down to third man for a single
slower one angled on middle and leg, turned away to short fine leg, brings up the half-century
shortish on the off, rises up to him but he does well, playing it with an angled bat down to third man for a single

dropped, Butler fails to hold on, a full toss on the off, tries to smack it through extra cover but the bat turns in his hand and he ends up playing it back to the bowler, Butler reaches for it with his right hand but the reaction was a little late

it doesn't matter! He's trapped Kamran in front with a full delivery on off and middle, bends low, gets across to paddle it fine, misses, is struck on the pads and the umpire has no hesitation, was plumb
starts in typical fashion, bowled full outside off and he chips it over the in-field on the off side wide of deep extra cover for a couple of runs
short of a good length on middle, dropped into the leg side for a single
banged it short and bowled it a little slow, thought of smacking it through square leg initially but withdrew, took the edge but landed right next to him
short again and he dispatches it over midwicket, beating that gap in the outfield between long-on and deep midwicket for his first boundary
bowls it wider this time, Afridi reaches for it to play it towards third man, doesn't connect
angling it towards middle, pushes it past the bowler for a single
bowled it short on the off, opened the face at the right time to guide it to third man for a single
ooh, almost snapped a blinder there, Guptill threw himself to his right as Umar square-drove it uppishly past him, beat the fielder's reach, and earned a boundary
delicately done, a fraction short outside off, nudges it past the keeper, wide of third man, for a couple of runs

went across and just dabbed it into the leg side through the vacant midwicket region, the fielder from the deep had to run in a fair distance to collect and that gave ample time for the pair to steal a couple
full and wide, reached for it and steered it towards Guptill at point
what a crime, he's conceded a freehit after overstepping, close call, run down to third man
no damage done, went round the wicket, bowled it on a length on leg stump and angled it in as Afridi to heave that into the stands, he missed
fullish on the off, just chips it down towards long-off for a single
dropped, Taylor spills it, short on the off and he pulls it powerfully to midwicket where Taylor can't hold on to a sharp chance
another short one, pulled again and Taylor does well getting his body behind that one, saved a few runs there
bowled full on the off, drills that down towards long-off for a single
the slower offcutter, at 113 kmph, tries to nudge it down to third man, misses
tries it again, a little wider, tries to open the face but can't make any contact
closer to the stumps, dabs it just wide of point for a single, just two off the over, well done by Styris
shortish on middle and leg, tries to go for the sweep, is struck on the arm, squeezes a single on the overthrow
makes room and he tries to chase him, short and extremely slow on leg stump, swatted down to deep cover
short of a length on middle, pulled down to deep midwicket for a single
lucky, quicker through the air, played for the spin as he tried to flick that through midwicket, got the leading edge ell wide of point for a couple of runs
pitched it up, clubbed it down to long-on for a single struck fiercely but couldn't pierce the gap
targeting the blockhole, hurls it full on middle, dug out to midwicket, the last couple of overs have been tight
a horrendous delivery, one of the biggest wides ever, aiming at the 27th stump outside off
low full toss on the off, reaches forward and drives it wide of Guptill at long-off for a well-run couple, good return but he's made it back in time
another wide, made a bit of room, landed within the wide-mark and moved away as he tried to reach it, a tough call
follows it up with a full toss, on the off stump and Afridi swings it over the bowler's head onto the sight screen, contrasting overs by Styris
in the blockhole on middle, pushed down the ground towards long-on for a single
slower one bowled short on the off, taps it down towards point from the crease
shortish outside off, cutting in, cuts it straight to point
picked the slower one, a touch too full there, overpitched, he bent low and slog-swept that miles into the stands over long-on

..or have I jinxed it? Gave it a bit of air, bowled it full on leg, Afridi went for the slog-sweep, the shot was on but couldn't connect it well, struck it straight into the palms of Bond waiting at deep midwicket
shortish on middle, gets back and punches it to midwicket
pushed it quicker, just a fraction short outside off, goes for the cut, misses
driven off the front foot down to long-on for a single
shortish on middle, worked away through midwicket for a single
bowled it full on middle, cheekily done, got forward and paddled it down to the fine-leg boundary
bowls it on a good length on middle, drives it down towards long-on for a single
short on the off, pulls it away just wide of deep midwicket for a couple of runs
slower one bowled full outside off, drives it uppishly inside-out wide of long-off for a couple more
angling it in on middle, chops it into the off side short of point for a single
bowls it on a good length on middle, chips it towards long-on for a single
he's missed a few of those day, tries to guide it down to third man, shortish but it zips past the outside edge
angles it in from wide of the crease, pushed back to the bowler
slower one bowled short on the off, chops it towards point from the crease
down the leg side, slower one that, concedes a wide
finds the gap, bowled it short on middle, rocked back and pulled it between deep midwicket and long-on
he's skied it, bowled it full on the off, came down the track and tried to launch him over long-off, miscued it and Styris running in from deep extra cover held on to an excellent catch
hurled it short outside off, tried to slash it towards third man, misses
full and wide, tries to thrash it over the covers but can't connect
he strikes! Full outside off from round the wicket, Razzaq goes for a booming drive through the covers, ends up getting a thick edge to the keeper, gone first ball
short of a good length on the off, punched past the bowler towards long-off

it finally works, he's been trying that all day, short on the off, slower one and got some extra bounce, just at the right height for him to open the face and glide it past the keeper for a boundary to beat third man
short of a length outside off, cut away down towards third man for a single
hurled it short outside off, mistimes a cut over point but manages to get a couple, the umpire intervenes and calls it one short
slower one bowled full on middle, pushed down the pitch past the bowler for a single
short  of a good length on the off, taps it in front of short third for a single
threw it up on middle, went for the reverse-paddle there, got the inside edge into the leg side for a single
drew him into the drive with a fullish delivery outside off, got an inside edge onto his pads
straightish on middle and leg, worked away through square leg for a single
moving around the crease there, bowled it full from round the wicket on the off stump, tried to close the face, got a leading edge wide of the bowler
hurls it full on the off stump, drives it down the ground to long-off
slower one bowled full on the off, tries to crash it down the ground, mistimes it to midwicket
slower one bowled short on middle, was too early into that attempted pull, missed it
another short one, this time at 133 kmph, pulled away wide of long-on for a couple of runs
poor ball, full toss outside off, makes room and slashes it past point wide of Broom, who slides but can't haul it back in, for a boundary
short of a length on the off, chops it down wide of point for a single
slower one bowled on a good length on the off, driven back to the bowler
in the blockhole on middle, dug out towards long-on for a single
full toss on middle, pulls it away but on the bounce to deep midwicket for a single
Umar jabs that in front of short third man for a single to reach his half-century, an impressive innings
Alam opens up, bowls it on a length on middle, in the slot for Alam who clubs it powerfully wide of long-on for a six
slower one bowled short outside off, cut away over point for a single
slower one bowled on a good length outside off, moved across to scoop it over short fine, missed it
bowls it full on the off, pushed wide of extra cover for a single
length ball on the off stump, makes room and smashes it over his head, wide of a diving long-on, for a boundary
bowls it full on the off, dug out wide of extra cover for a single
hurls it full on the off, drills it hard down the ground to long-off and Umar calls for the second to make it back just in time
slower one bowled full on the off, cracked down to long-off for single
full on the off, good attacking fielding from long-on as he runs in to keep them down to the single
